channel.title: Life on Maira Martins K
channel.description: Recent content in Life on Maira Martins K

item.title: Hello World
item.description: This is my second attempt at a programming blog. The first time was about a year ago, right when I first started to learn web development and unfortunately I was overcome with impostor syndrome and ended up deleting all the posts. I kinda regret that I didn’t keep at it. It would have been so nice to go back and read about my many discoveries and challenges. (You hear that, reader from the future?
